name: Shooting Balls 3D
description:
Escape from work stress or school stress?

Knock everything ahead of you, and see them fall! All from the safe space on your mobile device.

Dozens of unbelievable levels and you will never feel bored. Try to find the shortest way to win the game! Never forget to use more game props, the game is tricky enough to require your skills!

Besides, bundles charming skins are waiting here for you!!
